addr: 136 W 21st St, 6th Floor. Room 631-F. New York, NY 10010
title: Internship Information Session
desc: Find out how to land a great internship and jump start your career now! ?Learn how you can qualify for the SVA Internship-for-Credit program. ?This overview will cover student enrollment criteria, the responsibilities of both students and employers during an internship, how to find and apply for an internship, SVA procedures and application forms, special requirements for international students, and deadlines for the spring semester. ?The Career Development staff will show how to use CareerLink, the online application system.  This event is open to Juniors, Seniors, and Graduate students only. ? Registration for this event will begin November 20, 2015.
